detailsData.title: Decades of Experience
detailsData.content: We have decades of experience handling injury cases in Binghamton and across New York’s Southern Tier. Our extensive knowledge and expertise ensure that we can effectively represent our clients.

detailsData.title: Client-First Approach
detailsData.content: Our staff of qualified legal professionals is dedicated to putting clients first. We treat clients like family and strive to make our firm a friendly and welcoming place for the people we represent.

detailsData.title: Comprehensive Case Handling
detailsData.content: We handle all aspects of injury claims, including lost income, property damage, mileage, and other losses. This allows our clients to focus on their recovery while we manage the legal complexities.

detailsData.title: Strong Community Ties
detailsData.content: Scott C. Gottlieb and his team maintain strong ties to the community in Binghamton and elsewhere in New York’s Southern Tier. This local knowledge and reputation help us negotiate effectively with insurance adjusters.

companyName: Scott C. Gottlieb, Injury Law Attorney
subHeading: Injury Cases, That's All We Do.
valueProp: At Scott C. Gottlieb, Injury Law Attorney, our entire legal practice is devoted to helping people who have been hurt in accidents that were someone else’s fault. We only represent injured people – never insurance companies or large corporations. Focusing solely on personal injury cases allows us to deliver exceptional client service as we fight for the compensation our clients deserve.
openHours: Monday to Friday 8:00AM-5:00PM, Saturday and Sunday Closed
